tasks.name: Restore Voice Dependencies and Verify Audio Hardware
tasks.description: Install and activate voice processing dependencies that are currently commented out in the existing voice interface system. Verify audio hardware availability and configuration.
tasks.notes: Dependencies are already isolated in requirements-voice.txt. Existing code has try/catch imports for graceful degradation when dependencies unavailable.

relatedFiles.description: Main voice interface class with conditional imports
Add voice dependencies to setup script

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Install voice dependencies: pip install -r config/requirements-voice.txt (speechrecognition==3.10.0, pydub==0.25.1, pyaudio==0.2.11, gtts==2.3.1)
2. Verify existing /src/voice_interface.py imports are working (lines 1-15 handle graceful import failures)
3. Test audio device availability: Check microphone and speaker access on target systems
4. Update setup.sh to include voice dependencies in fresh installations
5. Verify VoiceInterface class initialization in backend/app_factory.py:178 works without errors
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. Voice dependencies installed successfully
2. VoiceInterface class initializes without import errors
3. Backend app_factory.py shows VoiceInterface in app.state
4. Audio devices detected and accessible
5. No import errors in voice_interface.py
tasks.analysisResult: Voice Processing System Restoration - Systematic reactivation of existing but disabled voice interface infrastructure in AutoBot platform. Leverages complete existing framework including VoiceInterface class in /src/voice_interface.py, Vue frontend component, backend API endpoints, and configuration system. Focus on enhancement rather than replacement, with specific integration to orchestrator and agent processing pipeline.
tasks.summary: Voice dependencies successfully restored and verified. Installed speechrecognition==3.10.0, pydub==0.25.1, gtts==2.3.1, and pyttsx3. VoiceInterface class initializes without errors with both Speech Recognition and Text-to-Speech engines available. Backend voice API endpoints (/api/voice/listen, /api/voice/speak) are properly configured. Updated setup.sh script to include voice dependencies for future installations. Voice interface framework is fully operational and ready for enhancement.
